game.name: Dangerous Lands - Magic and RPG
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Watch out! You are in Dangerous Lands, where monsters and magic can be found everywhere. Fight with monsters through the entire land. Use your sword and combine with your magic to obliterate all enemies in your way.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Watch out! You are in Dangerous Lands, where monsters and magic can be found everywhere. Fight with monsters through the entire land. Use your sword and combine with your magic to obliterate all enemies in your way.
